scenarios.name: Verify Claude.ai Login
scenarios.description: Verify user is logged into Claude.ai
scenarios.prompt: Navigate to claude.ai and verify I'm logged in by checking we're not on a login page. The page should show the chat interface.
scenarios.expected: Chat interface visible, not login form

scenarios.name: Add MCP Server
scenarios.description: Add the Odoo MCP server as a custom integration
scenarios.prompt: Go to claude.ai/settings/connectors, click 'Browse connectors', then 'add a custom one', fill in name '{mcp_server_name}' and URL '{mcp_server_url}', expand Advanced settings and add OAuth Client ID, then submit
scenarios.expected: Integration appears in the connectors list

scenarios.name: OAuth Connection
scenarios.description: Connect and authenticate with the MCP server via OAuth
scenarios.prompt: On the connectors page, find '{mcp_server_name}' and click Connect. Complete the Google sign-in flow when prompted
scenarios.expected: Integration shows 'Configure' button (connected)

scenarios.name: Verify Tools Available
scenarios.description: Verify all MCP tools are loaded and available
scenarios.prompt: Go to Settings > Connectors > '{mcp_server_name}' > Configure and count the available tools
scenarios.expected: 19+ tools visible including profile, leave, and document tools

scenarios.name: Get My Profile
scenarios.description: Test retrieving authenticated user's employee profile
scenarios.prompt: Show me my employee profile from Odoo
scenarios.expected: Returns user profile with name, job_title, department, email, phone, manager, hire_date

scenarios.name: Get My Manager
scenarios.description: Test retrieving manager information
scenarios.prompt: Who is my manager? Show me their contact details
scenarios.expected: Returns manager's name, title, email, phone, department

scenarios.name: Get My Team
scenarios.description: Test retrieving team/department colleagues
scenarios.prompt: Show me who else is in my department
scenarios.expected: Returns list of colleagues in same department with names, titles, emails

scenarios.name: Find Colleague by Name
scenarios.description: Test searching for a colleague by name
scenarios.prompt: Find contact info for Martin in Odoo
scenarios.expected: Returns matching employees with name, email, phone, department

scenarios.name: Find by Department
scenarios.description: Test listing employees in a specific department
scenarios.prompt: List all employees in the Engineering department
scenarios.expected: Returns all employees in specified department with roles

scenarios.name: Get Direct Reports
scenarios.description: Test retrieving direct reports for a manager
scenarios.prompt: Show me who reports directly to me
scenarios.expected: Returns direct reports with names and titles

scenarios.name: Update My Contact Info
scenarios.description: Test updating employee contact information
scenarios.prompt: Update my mobile phone number to +1-555-TEST
scenarios.expected: Confirmation: contact info updated successfully

scenarios.name: Search Employee Directory
scenarios.description: Test searching employees by job title
scenarios.prompt: Search for employees with 'Engineer' in their job title
scenarios.expected: Returns matching employees with job titles

scenarios.name: View Custom Fields
scenarios.description: Test retrieving custom employee fields like preferred name and division
scenarios.prompt: Show my preferred name and division from my profile
scenarios.expected: Returns x_preferred_name and x_division fields if configured

scenarios.name: Get Coach Info
scenarios.description: Test retrieving coach/mentor information
scenarios.prompt: Who is my coach or mentor assigned in Odoo?
scenarios.expected: Returns coach name and contact details or indicates no coach assigned

scenarios.name: Find All Managers
scenarios.description: Test searching for employees with manager roles across departments
scenarios.prompt: Find all employees who are managers in the company
scenarios.expected: Returns employees with manager/director titles

scenarios.name: Revert Contact Update
scenarios.description: Test reverting a contact info change
scenarios.prompt: Revert my mobile phone back to the original value +420 724 253 175
scenarios.expected: Contact info reverted successfully

scenarios.name: Get Leave Balance
scenarios.description: Test checking leave/vacation balance
scenarios.prompt: How many vacation days do I have left?
scenarios.expected: Returns leave balance by type (PTO, sick, etc.) with allocated, taken, remaining days

scenarios.name: Get Specific Leave Balance
scenarios.description: Test checking specific leave type balance
scenarios.prompt: How many sick days do I have remaining?
scenarios.expected: Returns specific leave type balance

scenarios.name: View Leave History
scenarios.description: Test viewing past leave requests
scenarios.prompt: Show all my time-off requests from 2025
scenarios.expected: Returns list of past requests with dates, type, days, status

scenarios.name: View Pending Leave
scenarios.description: Test filtering leave requests by pending status
scenarios.prompt: Do I have any leave requests waiting for approval?
scenarios.expected: Returns only pending/draft leave requests or empty list

scenarios.name: View Upcoming Leave
scenarios.description: Test viewing approved future leave
scenarios.prompt: What time off do I have scheduled coming up?
scenarios.expected: Returns approved future leave requests with dates

scenarios.name: Request Vacation
scenarios.description: Test submitting a new vacation request
scenarios.prompt: Submit a vacation request for March 10-14, 2026 with reason 'Spring break'
scenarios.expected: Leave request created with request_id, status 'submitted' or 'draft'

scenarios.name: Request Sick Leave
scenarios.description: Test submitting a sick leave request
scenarios.prompt: Submit a sick leave for today because I'm not feeling well
scenarios.expected: Sick leave request created

scenarios.name: Request Half Day
scenarios.description: Test requesting a half day off
scenarios.prompt: Request a half day off on Friday afternoon for a doctor appointment
scenarios.expected: Request created with half-day duration

scenarios.name: Cancel Leave Request
scenarios.description: Test canceling a pending leave request
scenarios.prompt: Cancel my most recent pending leave request
scenarios.expected: Leave request cancelled, status 'cancelled' or 'refuse'

scenarios.name: Check Team Availability
scenarios.description: Test checking who is on leave in the team
scenarios.prompt: Who in my team is on vacation next week?
scenarios.expected: Returns team members on leave with dates

scenarios.name: View Public Holidays
scenarios.description: Test viewing company public holidays
scenarios.prompt: What are the public holidays this year?
scenarios.expected: Returns list of public holidays for 2026

scenarios.name: Leave Request with Reason
scenarios.description: Test submitting leave with specific reason
scenarios.prompt: Request 2 days off for my sister's wedding on June 5-6, 2026
scenarios.expected: Request created with reason attached

scenarios.name: Request Unpaid Leave
scenarios.description: Test requesting unpaid leave beyond PTO balance
scenarios.prompt: Request 3 days of unpaid leave for July 1-3, 2026
scenarios.expected: Unpaid leave request created with request_id

scenarios.name: All Leave Balances
scenarios.description: Test viewing all leave type balances at once
scenarios.prompt: Show all my leave balances for all types (PTO, sick, unpaid, etc.)
scenarios.expected: Returns balances for all configured leave types

scenarios.name: Same-Day Sick Leave
scenarios.description: Test submitting sick leave for current day
scenarios.prompt: I'm sick today, please submit a sick leave request for today
scenarios.expected: Same-day sick leave created

scenarios.name: Multi-Day Sick Leave
scenarios.description: Test submitting multi-day sick leave
scenarios.prompt: Submit sick leave for Monday through Wednesday next week
scenarios.expected: Multi-day sick leave request created

scenarios.name: Leave Spanning Holiday
scenarios.description: Test requesting leave that includes a public holiday
scenarios.prompt: Request vacation for December 23-27, 2026 (includes Christmas)
scenarios.expected: Leave created, days should exclude public holiday from calculation

scenarios.name: Check Holiday in Date Range
scenarios.description: Test checking if public holidays fall within a date range
scenarios.prompt: Are there any public holidays during December 20-31, 2026?
scenarios.expected: Returns public holidays within the specified range

scenarios.name: Full Year Holidays
scenarios.description: Test viewing all public holidays for planning
scenarios.prompt: Show me all public holidays for 2026 so I can plan my vacation
scenarios.expected: Returns complete list of 2026 public holidays

scenarios.name: Single Day Leave
scenarios.description: Test requesting just one day off
scenarios.prompt: Take off just April 15, 2026 as a vacation day
scenarios.expected: Single day leave request created

scenarios.name: Balance After Request
scenarios.description: Test checking balance impact after submitting request
scenarios.prompt: How many vacation days will I have left after my pending requests are approved?
scenarios.expected: Returns balance accounting for pending requests

scenarios.name: Multiple Pending Requests
scenarios.description: Test viewing multiple pending leave requests
scenarios.prompt: Show all my pending leave requests that are waiting for approval
scenarios.expected: Returns all pending/draft status requests

scenarios.name: View Document Categories
scenarios.description: Test listing available document folders
scenarios.prompt: What document categories are available to me in Odoo?
scenarios.expected: Returns list of accessible folders (Contracts, Identity, etc.) with document counts

scenarios.name: List All My Documents
scenarios.description: Test retrieving all personal HR documents
scenarios.prompt: Show me all my HR documents
scenarios.expected: Returns list of documents with id, filename, category, mimetype, size, upload_date

scenarios.name: List Contract Documents
scenarios.description: Test filtering documents by contracts category
scenarios.prompt: Show me my employment contracts
scenarios.expected: Returns documents from Contracts folder only

scenarios.name: List Identity Documents
scenarios.description: Test filtering identity documents
scenarios.prompt: Show me my identity documents on file (passport, ID, etc.)
scenarios.expected: Returns documents from Identity folder only

scenarios.name: Download Document
scenarios.description: Test downloading a specific document
scenarios.prompt: Download my latest contract document
scenarios.expected: Returns document with id, filename, mimetype, content_base64

scenarios.name: Upload Identity Document
scenarios.description: Test uploading an identity document
scenarios.prompt: Upload a test passport document to my Odoo identity folder. Use filename 'test_passport.pdf' with base64 content 'dGVzdCBjb250ZW50' (test content) and document type 'passport'
scenarios.expected: Document uploaded with file_id, status 'uploaded'

scenarios.name: View Document Details
scenarios.description: Test viewing detailed document information
scenarios.prompt: Show details of my first document including size and upload date
scenarios.expected: Returns filename, size, upload_date, mimetype, category

scenarios.name: Check Expiring Documents
scenarios.description: Test checking for documents with approaching expiry
scenarios.prompt: Are any of my identity documents expiring in the next 6 months?
scenarios.expected: Returns documents with expiry dates approaching or message about no expiring docs

scenarios.name: Upload ID Card
scenarios.description: Test uploading a national ID card document
scenarios.prompt: Upload my national ID card as id_card.pdf with base64 content 'dGVzdCBpZCBjYXJk' and type 'id_card'
scenarios.expected: ID card uploaded successfully with file_id

scenarios.name: Upload Driving License
scenarios.description: Test uploading a driving license document
scenarios.prompt: Upload my driving license as driving_license.pdf with base64 content 'dGVzdCBsaWNlbnNl' and type 'driving_license'
scenarios.expected: Driving license uploaded successfully with file_id

scenarios.name: Document Count by Category
scenarios.description: Test counting documents per category
scenarios.prompt: How many documents do I have in each category?
scenarios.expected: Returns count of documents per folder (Contracts: X, Identity: Y)

scenarios.name: Recent Documents
scenarios.description: Test finding recently uploaded documents
scenarios.prompt: Show me documents uploaded in the last 30 days
scenarios.expected: Returns recently uploaded documents with dates

scenarios.name: Invalid Employee ID
scenarios.description: Test error handling for non-existent employee
scenarios.prompt: Show profile for employee ID 99999999
scenarios.expected: Returns appropriate error message: 'Employee not found' or similar

scenarios.name: Overlapping Leave Dates
scenarios.description: Test error handling for overlapping leave requests
scenarios.prompt: Request vacation for the same dates as an existing leave request
scenarios.expected: Error: 'Dates overlap existing request' or validation error

scenarios.name: Insufficient Leave Balance
scenarios.description: Test error handling when requesting more leave than available
scenarios.prompt: Request 100 days of vacation starting tomorrow
scenarios.expected: Error: 'Insufficient leave balance' or similar validation error

scenarios.name: Cancel Approved Leave
scenarios.description: Test error handling for canceling approved leave
scenarios.prompt: Cancel an already approved leave request that has passed
scenarios.expected: Error or warning about policy restrictions

scenarios.name: Access Restricted Document
scenarios.description: Test error handling for accessing others' documents
scenarios.prompt: Show me another employee's contract document
scenarios.expected: Error: 'Access denied' or restricted access message

scenarios.name: Invalid Date Format
scenarios.description: Test error handling for invalid date input
scenarios.prompt: Request leave for February 30, 2026
scenarios.expected: Error: 'Invalid date' or date validation error

scenarios.name: End Date Before Start
scenarios.description: Test error handling when end date is before start date
scenarios.prompt: Request vacation from March 15 to March 10, 2026
scenarios.expected: Error: 'End date must be after start date' or similar

scenarios.name: Past Date Request
scenarios.description: Test error handling when requesting leave in the past
scenarios.prompt: Request vacation for last week (December 20-24, 2025)
scenarios.expected: Error about past dates or validation error

scenarios.name: Invalid Leave Type
scenarios.description: Test error handling for non-existent leave type
scenarios.prompt: Request 'Birthday Leave' for my birthday next month
scenarios.expected: Error: 'Leave type not found' or similar

scenarios.name: Cancel Non-Existent Request
scenarios.description: Test error handling when canceling invalid request ID
scenarios.prompt: Cancel leave request with ID 99999999
scenarios.expected: Error: 'Request not found' or similar

scenarios.name: Empty Document Upload
scenarios.description: Test error handling for upload without content
scenarios.prompt: Upload an empty identity document without any content
scenarios.expected: Error: 'No content provided' or validation error

scenarios.name: Invalid Document Type
scenarios.description: Test error handling for invalid document type parameter
scenarios.prompt: Upload my contract document with type 'invalid_type_xyz'
scenarios.expected: Error about invalid document type or validation error

scenarios.name: Disconnect MCP Server
scenarios.description: Disconnect from the MCP server
scenarios.prompt: Go to claude.ai/settings/connectors, find '{mcp_server_name}' and click the menu (...) then Disconnect
scenarios.expected: Integration shows 'Connect' button (disconnected)

scenarios.name: Remove MCP Server
scenarios.description: Remove the MCP server integration completely
scenarios.prompt: Go to claude.ai/admin-settings/connectors, find '{mcp_server_name}', click the menu (...), then Remove and confirm the deletion
scenarios.expected: Integration removed from the list
